title: ICT Integration and Virtual Inquiry-Based Blended Learning Design in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Social studies education program for general citizens aged 40+, featuring blended learning and VR-based social inquiry activities in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain how to analyze social issues using virtual reality-based simulations
Learners can design collaborative inquiry activities by integrating ICT tools in blended learning environments
Learners can interpret social data collected in digital environments and propose practical solutions to real-world problems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
